```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr) 
library(lme4)
library(janitor)
library(corrplot)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
smoke <- read.csv(file = 'frmgham2.csv') %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r}

corr =  smoke %>% 
  dplyr::select(totchol, age, sysbp, diabp, bmi, sex, heartrte, cursmoke, cigpday, glucose) %>%
    mutate(totchol = as.numeric(totchol),
         bmi = as.numeric(bmi)) %>%
  na.omit()
corrplot(cor(corr), method="number",shade.col=NA, tl.col="black", tl.srt=65)

```
